abstract: Investors hoping to make millions buying the back-office operations of a foreclosure lawyer have come up short.
snippet: Investors hoping to make millions buying the back-office operations of a foreclosure lawyer have come up short.
lead_paragraph: David J. Stern may be the best-known beneficiary of the foreclosure boom, having made millions in recent years from evictions processed by his law firm, the largest of its kind in Florida.

headline.main: Bet on Foreclosure Boom Turns Sour
